item.title: European publicly listed company Capital B acquires 58 BTC, bringing its total holdings to 2013 BTC
item.description: July 28th. As per an official declaration, the European publicly listed company Capital B has obtained 58 BTC at around 5.9 million euros. After this acquisition, Capital B's overall Bitcoin holdings currently reach 2,013 BTC. The company has attained a year-to-date (YTD) Bitcoin return of 1,409.8%.

item.title: Binance: The new TGE project Delabs Games (DELABS) has a participation threshold of 218 points
item.description: On July 28th, according to official information, the participation requirement for the new TGE project Delabs Games (DELABS) on Binance Wallet is 218 points.Subscription Period: From 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM (UTC+8) on July 28th, 2025.

item.title: The Trump Media & Technology Group has invested $300 million to participate in a strategy involving options linked to Bitcoin-related securities.
item.description: On July 28th, according to Bloomberg's report, the Trump Media and Technology Group (TMTG) disclosed last week that it has put $300 million into a strategy that involves options linked to Bitcoin-related securities.Although many details remain unclear, this investment shows that Trump Media is resorting to leveraging Bitcoin's price. Trump's past social media posts on his "Truth Social" account have had an impact on the price of this cryptocurrency, and options strategies can assist investors in profiting from this price volatility.Castle Island Ventures partner Nick Carter stated that he voted for Trump and still supports him, but his association with the industry may lead to conflicts of interest, especially when options trading brings different risks and rewards into play.

item.title: French Minister of Industry: EU/US Trade Agreement is entering a further negotiation stage, which may last for several weeks or months
item.description: On July 28th, based on market information, the French Minister of Industry announced regarding the EU/US Trade Framework Agreement that both parties are currently entering a more advanced negotiation stage, which might last for several weeks or months. "This is not the conclusion of the matter."Previously, it was reported that Trump stated that an agreement had been reached with the EU.

item.title: Revolut Resumes Cryptocurrency Staking Service in Hungary
item.description: On July 28th, the digital bank Revolut announced the resumption of cryptocurrency staking services in Hungary. Previously, on July 7th, the company suspended most of its digital asset services due to the uncertainty of Hungary's new law.Hungary's new law, which took effect on July 1st, imposes severe penalties on unlicensed cryptocurrency exchanges. Retail users may face up to 5 years in prison, and service providers may face up to 8 years in prison. After a legal review, Revolut determined that staking services do not fall within the definition of "cryptocurrency exchange activities" under the law.

item.title: Smart Money with a cumulative profit of over $23 million gradually reduced its 25x leveraged ETH long position for nearly 1 hour, with the current long position still holding a floating profit of $...
item.description: On July 28th, according to on-chain data, a particular smart whale has been continuously reducing a 25x long position in ETH for nearly 1 hour. As of the moment of writing, the whale has decreased its position by 6,913.12 ETH, and the position value has decreased by $21,048,396.95. Currently, the whale still holds a long position in ETH worth $71.33 million with an unrealized profit of $4.76 million.Moreover, the address also holds 5x long positions in HYPE and PUMP. The address has made a profit of $2.94 million in the past 24 hours and a total profit of $23.47 million.

item.title: James Wynn: Bitcoin Dominance Continues to Decline, Altseason is Here
item.description: On July 28th, James Wynn stated in a post that the dominance of Bitcoin is in a freefall (with data showing it has dropped to 60.76%). The time is right, and the Risk-on (combined with his previous remarks, which can be understood as the Altseason) season has arrived.On July 25th, James Wynn mentioned that the price and market dominance of Bitcoin are declining synchronously, indicating that the market may transition to the Altseason.

item.title: ENA Surges Above $0.7 for a Brief Moment, 24-hour Gain Reaches 10.4%
item.description: On July 28th, based on HTX market data, ENA experienced a short-term breakthrough to $0.7 and is currently trading at $0.6901, showing a 24-hour price increase of 10.4%.

item.title: Ethereum Surpasses $3900 Again
item.description: On July 28th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum once more soared and exceeded $3,900. It is now trading at $3,929.52, with a 24-hour increase of 2.89%.

item.title: Alongside BNB's new all-time high, CZ's holdings may have surpassed $74.8 billion
item.description: On July 28th, Cointelegraph reported according to a June 2024 Forbes report that CZ held around 89.1 million BNB at that time. Given that BNB has been continuously reaching new all-time highs recently, based on the current BNB price of $840, the value of this BNB is approximately $74.844 billion.
